Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-21490 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.21-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-21490 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.21-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.6.21-1, affected by CVE-2025-21490
